basic.name: Hammerang (Q)
basic.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing 80 damage and Slowing enemies hit by 25% for 2 seconds. Reactive to explode the Hammer, dealing 95 damage to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Lightning Rod (W)
basic.description: Deal 107 damage to an enemy, and an additional 75 damage per second for 4 seconds while close to the target. Deals 100% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

basic.name: Barrel Roll (E)
basic.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 point Shield for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Hinterland Blast (R)
heroic.description: After 1 second, deal 475 damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.{highlight} 15% of all damage from Hinterland Blast is converted to shields that last indefinitely.{/highlight}

heroic.name: Mighty Gust (R)
heroic.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

trait.name: Tailwind (T)
trait.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 0.5% and refund 6 Mana.Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Hammerang, increase its damage by 15%.

1.name: Dishonorable Discharge
1.description: {highlight}Lightning Rod strikes against enemies who used dash skills deal an extra 80 damage. Passive: Increases Lightning Rod range by 25%.{/highlight}

1.name: Frequent Flyer
1.description: Activate Frequent Flyer to gain 40% Attack Speed and Tailwind for 4 seconds.Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 0.5 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Static Shield
4.description: Lightning Rod strikes grant a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health, up to 28%, for 4 seconds.{highlight} Basic attacks against the Lightning Rod target refresh one strike.{/highlight}

4.name: Updraft
4.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range by 40% and Shield amount by 70%, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.

4.name: Hammer Gains
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Secret Weapon
7.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 75% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

7.name: BOOMerang
7.description: Hammerang's explosion deals 100% additional damage, and hitting enemy Heroes reduces their Spell Armor by 15 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Crippling Hammer
7.description: Increase Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 50%, and Hammerang's explosion also Slows.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: After 1 second, deal 475 damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.{highlight} 15% of all damage from Hinterland Blast is converted to shields that last indefinitely.{/highlight}

10.name: Mighty Gust
10.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

13.name: Flying Riders
13.description: {highlight} While Tailwind is active, close allied Heroes receive 5% stacking Movement Speed. This bonus is increased to 7.5% if Falstad has shields.{/highlight}

13.name: Flow Rider
13.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Sustained Winds
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health, increased to 2% while Tailwind is active.

16.name: Aerie Gusts
16.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 5 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

16.name: Epic Mount
16.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 50 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: {highlight}Hinterland Blast increases its size by 15% and deals 25% more damage.{/highlight}

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for {highlight}3{/highlight} seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Thunder Frenzy
20.description: {highlight}Falstad charges up to 100 stacks by moving. When he reaches 100 charges, his next Basic Attack bounces 4 times prioritizing Heroes, slows every target by 99% for 0.3 seconds, has 1.1 increased range, and deals 200% extra damage.{/highlight}

20.name: Khaz Modan Torpedo
20.description: {highlight}Barrel Roll has two extra charges and applies Lightning Rod to every target he goes through.{/highlight}
